summary: The diff shows modifications to SettingsAboutScreen.tsx but the content is truncated at 4000 characters, cutting off before the contact information section is visible. Based on the visible portion, the file contains header, admin functionality, and background refresh logic, but the actual email and website contact details are not shown in the truncated diff. Without evidence of the contact information changes, I cannot confirm implementation of either requirement.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the email address displayed in the Settings/About screen from the current value to 'info@mawalkingradio.com'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for SettingsAboutScreen.tsx is truncated and does not show the contact information section where the email address would be displayed. No evidence of email update is visible in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the website URL displayed in the Settings/About screen from the current value to 'www.mawalkingradio.com'
missing_requirements.reason: The diff for SettingsAboutScreen.tsx is truncated and does not show the contact information section where the website URL would be displayed. No evidence of website URL update is visible in the provided diff.
